name: Zense
description:
This game was created by a joit team of 3 people:

Felipe Matamala is the VFX and 2D artist.

Lucas Puebla is one of the two programmer and composer of the main soundtrack.

Andrés Salgado  is the other programmer. 

Everything was built from scratch in the last 48h, we are proud of this game and hope yopu enjoy it!
